duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and drive larger, more sophisticated construction projects under general direction.
Work with Project Sponsors, Business Development, and Project Delivery Teams to identify and deliver program objectives.
Mentor project team and assess training needs to benefit future project leaders.
Coordinate monthly performance evaluations of strategic programs and provide reports to management.
Ensure project document controls are in compliance with contract requirements.
Continually seek and capitalize upon opportunities to increase customer satisfaction and deepen client relationships.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Construction, Civil, Mechanical, Electrical Engineering, Construction Management or Architecture (Master’s degree and PMP Certification preferred)
